works.complaint:
This blog is not in naive US language so this will be
a  
problem.

1. This blog is created with the intention of promoting homosexuality
which  
is illegal in Sri Lanka.
2. This specific link has some songs composed by famous composers (and
sung  
by famous singers). The meaning is compromised and abused to promote
number  
1.
3. Youtube links used.
4. The report faqs section implies that Blogger do not take down blogs
that  
are acceptable according to US laws. But we are pretty sure that 1 is not 

accepted in USA and many other EU countries. So this is not legal (In Sri 

Lanka it is prohibited and will be prohibited in the future. We do not
take  
US laws into account because this is promoted in SL and is using Sri
Lankan  
Native Language).
5. Please kindly take measures. The native language could be a problem  
(understanding).
Thank you!
Best regards,
Tharinda Lasika
